name: Sunsa
0:
”Alexa, open the living room blinds”
”Alexa, close the bedroom blinds”
”Alexa, set kitchen blinds to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Sunsa Wand upgrades your current blinds to smart blinds in under 2 minutes, save time, energy, and money by automating your blinds and control with your voice with Amazon Alexa.


Key phrases
After linking your Alexa account to your Sunsa account and discovering your Sunsa devices, you can say commands like:
"Alexa, open the living room blinds."
"Alexa, close the bedroom blinds."
"Alexa set the kitchen blinds to 50%."
